columns.customer_id: Unique identifier of the customer (PRIMARY KEY).

columns.order_id: Unique identifier of the order (PRIMARY KEY).
columns.customer_id: Identifier of the customer who placed the order (FOREIGN KEY).
columns.order_status: Current status of the order (e.g., Shipped, Pending, Cancelled).
columns.order_date: Date when the order was placed.
columns.required_date: Date when the order is required to be delivered.
columns.shipped_date: Date when the order was shipped.
columns.store_id: Identifier of the store that processed the order.
columns.staff_id: Identifier of the staff member responsible for the order.

products.description: List of all available products for sale.

columns.product_id: Unique identifier of the product (PRIMARY KEY).
columns.model_year: Year the product model was released.

order_items.description: Contains individual order items for each order.

columns.item_id: Item number within the order (PRIMARY KEY in combination with order_id).
columns.quantity: Quantity of the product in this order item.
columns.list_price: Unit price of the product at the time of the order.
columns.discount: Discount applied to the product (in fraction, e.g., 0.1 = 10%).

columns.staff_id: Unique identifier of the staff member (PRIMARY KEY).
columns.active: Whether the staff member is currently active (1 = yes, 0 = no).
columns.store_id: Identifier of the store where the staff member works.
columns.manager_id: Identifier of the manager supervising the staff member.

columns.store_id: Unique identifier of the store (PRIMARY KEY).
columns.city: City where the store is located.
columns.state: State or region of the store.
columns.zip_code: Postal ZIP code of the store.

brands.description: Stores a list of product brands.

columns.brand_id: Unique identifier of the brand (PRIMARY KEY).

columns.category_id: Unique identifier of the category (PRIMARY KEY).

stocks.description: Tracks product quantities in each store.

columns.quantity: Quantity of the product available in the store.
